Tag_Imageneed.description: ''[[The Fate of Atlantis | Assassin's Creed: Odyssey — The Fate of Atlantis]]''

MemoryInfobox.appearance: 'Assassin's Creed: Odyssey' - 'The Fate of Atlantis: Fields of Elysium'
MemoryInfobox.location: House of the Bloodline, Pheraia's Retreat, Elysium

General_Description: '''Brick House''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Riddle: ''[[Marble]] and [[limestone]] can't hold forever. A house needs reinforcements, and its foundations must be build to endure. One faulty crack can destroy everything. I fell with my eroding fortification into the water to the east, and will be shadowed by a wooden bridge forever if not found.''
Section_Outcome: Kassandra found and recovered the engraving.
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]'' - ''[[The Fate of Atlantis: Fields of Elysium]]''
